title: SHKNOCKS
author: SHKNOCKS
content: School of Hard KnocksWelcome to The School of Hard Knocks. A genuine and professional academic writer with astounding ingenuity in producing quality piece of paper at discounted price.I offer help in: CourseworkAssignments and DiscussionsQuizzesExamsEssay writingProposals and dissertationsResearch based writing and Content CreationHumanitiesHistoryReligionGeographySciencesBiologyPhysicsChemistryEngineeringProgrammingJava C++PythonMATLABJavaScriptMathematics Basic MathCalculus 1, 2, 3StatisticsDifferential EquationsDiscrete Math TrigonometryGeometryLinear AlgebraProbabilityPermutation and Combination (Combinatorics)PricesHomework writing services rate is $10-$15 per page depending on the urgency.Quizzes ranges from $35- $70Exams ranges from $50-$150N.B- The cost is given in USD and it's negotiable.PM me on telegram @SHKNOCKS

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Suppose you will accept payments in Bitcoin, otherwise you will have to move your topic to Marketplace (Altcoins)In general, how will the person ensure that the solutions come from more qualified teachers and that they are correct solutions, in addition to helping him to solve the problem himself, or are they ready-made solutions and he will print them?

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: SHKNOCKS on October 07, 2022, 05:59:58 AMHomework writing services rate is $10-$15 per page depending on the urgency.Quizzes ranges from $35- $70Exams ranges from $50-$150What is the payment method you are accepting for your service? Id it equivalent to the USD amount of BTC or any other currency or usdt? This board is for bitcoin payment only So, if you accept payment in bitcoin then there is no problem but if there is no BTC payment then you should place a post on the alternative currency section.
